mapper.sql: id, info_id, create_user_id, user_name, examine_id, telephone, address, id_card, sts, create_time, update_time, share_type, modify_user_id, modify_time
mapper.select:
SELECT si.id as id, CASE si.task_type WHEN '1' THEN '拼车' WHEN '2' THEN '车位共享' WHEN '3' THEN '时间互换' ELSE '资源共享' END AS taskType, si.start_time as startTime , si.end_Time as endTime, si.title as title , si.content as content, si.start_time as startTime, si.end_time as endTime , case sa.sts when '1' then '申请中' when '2' then '申请通过' when '3' then '拒绝' else '关闭申请' end sts FROM st_applet_share_info si INNER JOIN st_applet_share_apply sa ON si.id = sa.info_id where 1=1 and sa.create_user_id = #{userId}
and sa.sts = #{status}

select
,
from st_applet_share_apply where info_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sts != '3'
mapper.insert: insert into st_applet_share_apply (id, info_id, create_user_id, user_name, examine_id, telephone, address, id_card, sts, create_time, update_time, share_type, modify_user_id, modify_time, img_url ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{infoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sts,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update st_applet_share_apply
info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
examine_id = #{examineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sts = #{sts,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
share_type = #{shareType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
